column6: Phrases
a great amount of N.[U]

column5: rev up(v.)加速；提高；起飛；振奮；使情緒高漲
column6: attribute sth. to sth. 歸因於
be comprised of = be made of
be devoid of = be lack of
be justified to Ving = 做…是合理的
be subject to = 受…的控制

column3: conversely(adj.)相反地 衍：adversely, counter, opposite
column6: confess to N./Ving = admit = candid = own up 坦白
deprive from 被剝奪
endow with 被賦予
engage in sth.從事
engage in 從事
from the cradle to the grave=lifetime
give sb. credit for sth. 因…給…讚許
in terms of就…而論
not to mention 更不用說
on no account 絕不
regard to 考慮到 衍：delve into = research on研究
release from hospital 出院
resort to N./Ving = take action
stagger from A to B

column3: robust(adj.)強壯健康的；富有味道的
column6: to sum up 總結
turn the other cheek轉過臉頰=忍耐包容
yield to = concede to = make concession to = give in to
